snippet.title: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel - INTO HEL | Dev Diary | Episode 1
snippet.description:
Curious about new characters, gods, skill evolution plans, the possibility of daily/weekly quests, the inspiration behind the game, or even multiplayer features? Discover it all in the debut episode of our brand-new Jotunnslayer Dev Diaries series: INTO HEL!

Join Jakub Kokoška, Game Designer for Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel, as he dives into your top questions gathered from our devoted Discord community.

Questions
00:00 Intro 
00:32 How many people are part of the dev team? How long have you been working on the game?
00:46 What was the motivation for this game? 
01:26 Will multiplayer be supported in the final product?
01:48 Are you planning to add character customization?
02:07 Will other characters be playable during the beta or demo builds?
02:45 Will progress from the demo carry over to the main game?
03:30 What are the skill evolutions in the latest demo?
04:11 Will there be daily/weekly quests and progression in the future?
04:41 How many Norse gods can we expect in the full game?
05:20 Why did you choose Norse mythology?
06:17 Outro 

Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel DEMO is available on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3047240/Jotunnslayer_Hordes_of_Hel_Demo/ 

Join the Jotunnslayer community on Discord: 
https://discord.com/invite/Zst6agwu8v
